member.name: D3D_SHADER_MODEL.D3D_SHADER_MODEL_6_0
member.summary: Indicates shader model 6.0. Compiling a shader model 6.0 shader requires using the DXC compiler (see DirectX Shader Compiler), and is not supported by legacy FXC.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_MODEL.D3D_SHADER_MODEL_6_4
member.summary: Shader model 6.4 support was added in Windows 10, Version 1903, and is required for DirectX Raytracing (DXR).

member.name: D3D_SHADER_MODEL.D3D_SHADER_MODEL_6_5
member.summary: Shader model 6.5 support was added in Windows 10, Version 2004, and is required for Direct Machine Learning.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_MODEL.D3D_SHADER_MODEL_6_6
member.summary: Shader model 6.6 support was added in Windows 11 and the DirectX 12 Agility SDK.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_MODEL.D3D_SHADER_MODEL_6_7
member.summary: Shader model 6.7 support was added in the DirectX 12 Agility SDK v1.6. See Agility SDK 1.606.3: Shader Model 6.7 is now publicly available! on the DirectX developer blog.
